issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Using Appcelerator Studio, build: 5.0.0.201712081732
Installed Oracle JDK 1.8.152  ( jdk-8u151-macosx-x64.dmg ) from this URL:
http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html
*I already had / have JDK 1.8.131 installed.

h3. Actual Result
Appcelerator opens but I am unable to select anything from menu or click any open tabs. 
I had to force quit a few times and tried restarting mac osx 10.13 with same results. 
I found and used JPS tool to identify eclipse issue from URL 
http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Crashes_and_Freezes
I have attached jps log file. 
After removing JDK 1.8.152 appcelerator is now working as expected.

h3. Expected Result
appcelerator studio UI  is should work as expected or display an error.
fields.summary: Appcelerator UI locked up after installing JDK 1.8.152
